list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a melodious ringing sound, as produced by striking a bell.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I hear the chimes of the hour from the courthouse
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi nghe thấy tiếng chuông của giờ từ tòa án

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the projecting rim at the end of a cask.
(of a bell or clock) make melodious ringing sounds, typically to indicate the time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the grandfather clock in the next room chimed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đồng hồ ông nội ở phòng tiếp theo bị xáo trộn
